g.text: QUICK REFERENCE CARD - Keep This Handy!
‚Ä¢ Main entrance: Front lobby, turn left
‚Ä¢ Sessions: All keynotes, plenary, parallel A
‚Ä¢ Transit time to other rooms: 2-5 mins
‚úì Collect name badge, program, conference bag
‚úì Download conference app (QR code at desk)
‚úì Emergency contact card (keep in badge holder)
‚Ä¢ Multiple parallel sessions - plan your route
‚Ä¢ Checkout by 17:00 if staying at venue hotel
‚Ä¢ First Aid Station: Registration desk (Peterson II)
‚Ä¢ Nearest Hospital: North Estonia Medical Centre (5km)
‚Ä¢ Emergency Assembly Point: Main parking lot
‚Ä¢ All rooms wheelchair accessible via ramps/elevators
‚Ä¢ Sign language interpreters available on request
‚Ä¢ Large print programs at registration desk
‚Ä¢ Quiet room available: Alver & Adson side office
‚Ä¢ Lactation room: Available on request (key at desk)
‚Ä¢ Live streaming: Selected sessions on conference website
‚Ä¢ Digital poster gallery: Available 24/7 during conference
‚Ä¢ Tech check: 30 mins before each session
‚Ä¢ Airport shuttle: Bus #2 to city center (‚Ç¨2, 25 mins)
‚Ä¢ Public transport: Tallinn Card provides free access
‚Ä¢ Walking: Old Town 15 mins, Port 10 mins
‚Ä¢ Vegan Restoran V (200m): Plant-based fine dining
‚Ä¢ UNESCO Old Town (15 min walk): Medieval architecture
‚Ä¢ Toompea Castle (20 min walk): Parliament & views
‚Ä¢ Telliskivi Creative City (10 min): Arts & culture
‚Ä¢ Kadriorg Palace (25 min): Baroque palace & gardens
Full abstracts, speaker bios, interactive maps, and real-time updates

svg.text: ENBEL 2025: Connecting Health and Climate Change
Keep this guide handy throughout the conference | Download digital version from conference app
